title: Vikram
sub: Explore the world of Vikram, a gripping Tamil action thriller
description: Vikram (2022) follows a special agent uncovering a criminal conspiracy, featuring Kamal Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, and Fahadh Faasil in high-octane roles.

title: Kaithi
sub: A night of adrenaline as a prisoner becomes a hero
description: Kaithi (2019) is a gripping action-thriller where a recently released prisoner helps the police fight a drug mafia during one unforgettable night.

title: Jai Bhim
sub: A powerful courtroom drama based on true events
description: Jai Bhim (2021) showcases a lawyer's fight for justice for a tribal man wrongfully imprisoned. A hard-hitting story led by Suriya.

sub: A heartfelt tale of first love and nostalgia
description: 96 (2018) is a romantic drama that reunites two school sweethearts at a reunion, unfolding bittersweet memories and emotions.

title: Soorarai Pottru
sub: An underdog's inspiring journey to start an airline
description: Soorarai Pottru (2020) tells the true story of G. R. Gopinath’s dream to launch a low-cost airline, starring Suriya in a career-best performance.

title: Master
sub: A battle of ideologies between a professor and a gangster
description: Master (2021) features Thalapathy Vijay as an alcoholic professor who locks horns with a ruthless gangster played by Vijay Sethupathi.

title: Asuran
sub: A gripping tale of caste violence and redemption
description: Asuran (2019), starring Dhanush, is a rural action-drama that depicts a father's struggle to protect his family from upper-caste oppression.

title: Thani Oruvan
sub: A cat-and-mouse game between a cop and a cunning villain
description: Thani Oruvan (2015) is a stylish thriller where a brilliant cop takes on an evil scientist in a battle of wit and integrity.

title: Vada Chennai
sub: A gangster saga set in North Chennai
description: Vada Chennai (2018) is a raw crime drama where a carrom player gets drawn into the underworld politics of Chennai.

title: Pudhupettai
sub: A gangster's ruthless rise to power
description: Pudhupettai (2006) is a cult classic by Selvaraghavan about a slum boy who becomes a feared gangster, starring Dhanush.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
sub: A bold portrayal of caste-based discrimination
description: Pariyerum Perumal (2018) is a powerful drama about a law student’s struggle against social injustice in rural Tamil Nadu.

title: Super Deluxe
description: Super Deluxe (2019) intertwines multiple stories, exploring themes of gender, crime, and morality with an experimental narrative style.

title: Ratsasan
sub: A psychological thriller that keeps you on edge
description: Ratsasan (2018) is an intense thriller about a cop trying to catch a serial killer who targets schoolgirls, known for its suspenseful pace.

title: Karnan
description: Karnan (2021), starring Dhanush, tells the story of a young man rising against oppression and injustice in his village.

title: Anbe Sivam
sub: A profound journey of humanism and love
description: Anbe Sivam (2003) is a cult classic starring Kamal Haasan and Madhavan, highlighting themes of compassion, faith, and humanism.
